conf_title_desc: These settings will allow you to enter ad codes that can then be displayed throughout your forum
This section allows you to maintain your community guidelines.
Use this setting to turn switch your community online or offline, and to leave a message for your visitors.
This section allows you to comply with COPPA.
This section allows you to manage your copyright removal key.
This section allows certain features to be limited or removed to get more performance out of your board.
This section contains the date and time formats used throughout the board.
This section will allow you to change the incoming and outgoing email addresses as well as the email method.
These settings control the basics of the board such as URLs and paths.
Configure settings for Admob integration with the IPS Mobile App
Settings for the iPhone application
Manage IP.Board's various logs
Settings to optimize your site for search engine indexing
This section contains settings for your IPB's search system
These options allow you to adjust the security and privacy options for your board.
These settings help tailor your output based on your server's settings.
Settings for Facebook, Twitter, and other social media sharing tools.
Settings to refine the tagging system
Settings to manage your XML-RPC API interface
This section allows you to control the global PM options.
Configuration options for the reputation system
Settings for preventing and controlling spam, and for configuring the IPS Spam Service
This section allows you to adjust your members' global permissions and other options.
Settings to control display names on the forums.
This section will allow you to configure moderator settings
These options control various elements when posting, reading topics and reading polls.
Settings for archive functionality
Control the generation of your community's sitemap.
This section will allow you to set up the board calendar and its related options.
